code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./ClockWidget.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ClockWidget(){const[time,setTime]=useState(new Date());useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>setTime(new Date()),1000);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[]);const hours=String(time.getHours()).padStart(2,'0');const minutes=String(time.getMinutes()).padStart(2,'0');const day=String(time.getDate()).padStart(2,'0');const month=String(time.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0');const year=time.getFullYear();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"clock-widget widget",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"clock-time",children:[hours,":",minutes]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"clock-date",children:[day,".",month,".",year]})]});}export default ClockWidget;
